_xResult.title: Love in Eden Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made black velvet midi dress with hand embroidered flowers
_xResult.longdesc:
Nothing expresses elegance more than a classic model dress with a clean cut. This custom made midi has floral embroideries carefully hand-sewn along the bodice and a deep-v décolletage at the back. The skirt is specially cut with front and back folds for controlled volume, which makes the piece flattering on all silhouettes. The skirt also has hidden pockets—perfect for hiding your red lipstick!


ZaZa custom made to measure dresses fit better and can be customized in most cases. If you prefer to wear a bra or want a more modest back, click the button below to change the back to a shallower V for more coverage.
